stats.text: Over 6,000 carriers are already working with us

services.title: Machines
services.description:
• Quick closure of urgent shipments
• Three types of auctions: descending, first consent, no starting price

services.title: Cars
services.description:
• Fixation and accounting of contractual terms
• Automation of logistics processes
• Customization for specific tasks

services.title: And more...
services.description:
All types of tracking:

posts.title: Transportation of Automotive Vehicles
posts.description:
• Delivery of automotive vehicles
• Wide selection of cars at affordable prices
• Delivery by various methods

posts.title: Export / Import of Industrial Goods
posts.description:
• We deliver industrial goods
• We calculate the cost of transportation
• We deliver to your city within the specified time

posts.title: Feedback During Transportation
posts.description:
• We promptly inform you about the status of your cargo.
• Accurately calculate arrival time.
• Your cargo is under control — we are always in touch.

products.title: Car Export
products.description: Our service helps export goods to various countries, providing efficient logistics solutions and compliance with all international standards.

products.title: Special Equipment Export
products.description: We offer professional services for exporting special equipment to various countries worldwide. Our company provides a full cycle of supply organization: from equipment selection and documentation to delivery and customs clearance.

products.title: Factory and Special Equipment
products.description: We import special equipment from China and CIS countries for your enterprise, ensuring high productivity and quality.
